string.text: Changes damage recieved, like in difficulty settings, but for every hero.
This value is used to calculate the damage every hero (Companion, Noble, Player...) receives.
This value is used to calculate the damage hero's horse recieves.
Changes hitpoints in battle. Does not affect campaign. Usefull when you want to survive long, but still be staggered.
This value is used to calculate hero hitpoints in battle. Heroes will still take same damage but will have more health.
This value is used to calculate hero's horse hitpoints in battle. Notice, this is calculated on start of a battle, so even if dismounted changes will persist.
